name: Remembering Lunar New Year
description:
It's your first Lunar New Year alone, but you don't remember how to set up for the holiday. Maybe going through your photo album will help jog your memory!

Remembering Lunar New Year is a small collection of puzzle minigames where the player will learn to make dumplings, set up a shrine, and find the correct people to give li xi to.

Controls
Mouse click and drag

Created for the York University Global Game Jam 2023.
